comments.body: `Topology` must be stored in the `Endpoint` so that we can get topology information when we filter the topologically-best set of endpoints.
I think the original function header is good enough. Why does it have to change?

Ref https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/56880#discussion_r169744581, Pavithra pointed out this is returning a string, instead of returning the ClusterIP field, which is in net.IP. Renaming makes this purpose clear.
